CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: 8 and our group 9 independently reported PCDTBT - based ladder - type polymers with forced planarity of which device performance showed impressive PCEs of up to 4.59% with reduced bandgap ( ca.

Let's think step by step.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| PCDTBT |
| ladder-type polymers |
| reduced bandgap (ca.) |

In this paragraph, the "Material Name" entities are "PCDTBT," "ladder-type polymers," and "reduced bandgap (ca.)." These terms are mentioned as materials or substances used in the described research.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material name" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| PCDTBT |

After reevaluating the paragraph, I found that only "PCDTBT" is a clear "Material Name" entity. The term "ladder-type polymers" is a type of material, but it is not specific enough to be considered a material name. The "reduced bandgap (ca.)" is not a material but a property of a material. Therefore, I have removed these unclear entities from the list.

PN.content:
Please identify the "Property Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: 8 and our group 9 independently reported PCDTBT - based ladder - type polymers with forced planarity of which device performance showed impressive PCEs of up to 4.59% with reduced bandgap ( ca.

Let's think step by step.

| Property Name |
| --- |
| PCDTBT |
| ladder - type polymers |
| forced planarity |
| device performance |
| PCEs |
| reduced bandgap |

Note: I have assumed that "PCEs" stands for "power conversion efficiencies" as it is a common term in the field of photovoltaics. If my assumption is incorrect, please let me know.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material property" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Property Name |
| --- |
| PCDTBT |
| ladder - type polymers |
| forced planarity |
| reduced bandgap |

Note: I have removed "device performance" and "PCEs" as they do not clearly refer to material properties. "PCDTBT" and "ladder-type polymers" are specific materials, while "forced planarity" and "reduced bandgap" are properties of those materials.
